AetherCore.Orchestrator.description: Root controller that governs skill execution, workflow routing, dependency validation, and global synthesis.

tool_descriptions.route: Routes tasks to the correct skill using dependency graph logic.
tool_descriptions.schedule: Manages ordering and priority of skill execution.
tool_descriptions.synthesize: Combines outputs of subordinate and callable skills into final result.

AetherCore.EventMesh.description: Event routing fabric responsible for inter-skill communication, message dispatch, and runtime event propagation.

tool_descriptions.emit: Emits events onto the skill message bus.

AetherCore.OptiGraph.description: Optimization and calibration system that evaluates performance, quality, and dependency graph efficiency.

tool_descriptions.optimize: Applies optimization rules across the skill graph.
tool_descriptions.validate: Validates outputs for structural integrity and FOIP compliance.
tool_descriptions.telemetry: Generates performance metrics for runtime introspection.

AetherCore.DeepForge.description: Advanced multi-phase research engine with evidence gathering, long-chain reasoning, synthesis, and verification.

tool_descriptions.research: Performs multi-stage research passes including source collection and extraction.
tool_descriptions.analyze: Executes structured analysis with scaffolded reasoning.
tool_descriptions.verify: Conducts verification across internal and external knowledge.

AetherCore.MarketSweep.description: Commerce and marketplace scanning engine supporting product discovery, price comparison, and deal scoring.

tool_descriptions.validate: Verifies product link integrity and availability.

AetherCore.GeminiBridge.description: Hybrid external intelligence augmentation using Gemini API for fallback, escalation, and alternative reasoning.

tool_descriptions.escalate: Escalates complex tasks to Gemini for hybrid processing.

AetherCore.PromptFoundry.description: Dynamic prompt generation system with structured roles, templates, and multi-domain transformation capabilities.

tool_descriptions.generate: Generates optimized prompts using domain presets.
tool_descriptions.presets: Enumerates professional prompt presets and roles.
tool_descriptions.export: Exports prompts into multiple LLM formats.

notes.skill_alignment: All skill names, versions, dependencies, and callability reflect literal config JSON
